definition: to restore (sth) to (its) former condition/to recover from illness/recovery
original spot/previous place/where it was before
to restore sth to its original state
back to where we were (idiom); absolutely no improvement/Things haven't changed at all.
original shape/true appearance (under the disguise)/true character
to conserve/to preserve/to keep/to save (a file etc) (computing)
